resources.string: Java supports the creation and existence of abstract classes that expose interfaces.
Java does not have composition, association and aggregation.
Only two types of polymorphism are compile-time and runtime polymorphism.
JVM (Java Virtual Machine) is compile virtual machine.
Inheritance provides an object with the ability to acquire the fields and methods of another class.
The static keyword denotes that a member variable or method can be accessed, without requiring an instantiation of the class to which it belongs.
Java have eight primitive Data Types: byte, short, int, long, float, double, boolean and char.
Method overriding in Java occurs when two or more methods in the same class have the exact same name, but different parameters.
